item.description:
This is an update on 9 July:

Due to work (military) things I won't be able to get to Terminal 110 till later, around 9pm. For those that do come early for happy hour the drink specials are for everyone. I'll be in the happy hour bar area between 9 and 10pm. I'll be with Dulce. After 10pm I'll get our table and look for us in the VIP area.









Keys to the City and Seargent Peppers have given us a great offer:

"Happy hour drink specials from 5-8pm which includes 3 dollar drinks and drafts, free VIP section upstairs with a complimentary bottle of champagne. Stevie B performing live that night. The VIP areas are roped off areas with a table and seating for your group. You also have a cocktail waitress that will serve you. The place has been packed since our opening, I'm sure it will more than live up to your expectations."
- Terminal 110 Rep.


Here is the link to their website: http://www.terminal11...


So we have Happy Hour specials, a VIP table, a live performer, and access to two different venues in one location if one isn't your seen.

What are we waiting for again?



- I'll update this page as the days get closer to this event.
item.name: Keys to the City and Sgt. Peppers
